features: TAILBONE, SCIATICA PAIN RELIEF: Our car seat pillow targets sciatica pain, tailbone discomfort, and sitting fatigue resulting from long commutes or extended 8+ hour workdays. Experience relief in both car and office settings

GEL MEMORY FOAM: Our gel memory foam car seat cushions with ventilation holes ensure a plush and cool experience, whether you're driving or working at your desk. Stay comfortable even during hot car rides and long office meetings
HEAT RESPONSIVE TECHNOLOGY: Our car seat pillows for driving adapt to your body's contours using natural body heat, providing customized support during your car commute and extended office sessions

POSTURE SUPPORT: Maintain proper posture and reduce strain on your spine and muscles. The memory foam car seat cushion encourages an upright and balanced sitting position, ensuring a productive day both on the road and in the office

BOOSTER SEAT FOR ADULTS: Our car cushion is not just for comfort but also serves as an excellent car booster seat for short drivers. It provides an elevated seating position, making it easier to reach car controls and see the road ahead

Seat Cushion, Back Cushion Questions & Answers Benefits of a back cushion Back support pillows help bridge the gap between the comfort and support your current seat lacks. Our back cushion contours around the natural curve of your spine to lessen discomfort, improve your sitting posture, and reduce sitting fatigue. Benefits of a seat cushion Sitting in your car for long commutes can cause discomfort in the back, hips, and coccyx. Without proper cushioning, that discomfort becomes more agitated. Adding a chair pad to your car seat or office chair can help take the pressure off your lower body. How to apply the back cushion? Our lumbar support cushion can be placeed anwyhere on your seat to support your upper, middle, and lower back. Dual adjustable straps ensure it stays in place, even if you shift about. Fits virtually any car seat or office chair with a maximum width of 32" (81cm). How to use the seat cushion? Place the seat cushion on any seat with the Everlasting Comfort logo at the front and the U-shaped coccyx cutout at the back. Can you wash the cushions? Yes, our cushions feature a removable cover that's easy to clean and keep fresh. Simply unzip the cover from the memory foam, and toss cover into the wash on the gentle cycle. Tumble dry with low heat for best results.
